page.title: 02PARWICH PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school was built in 1861. We do all kinds of work, like mathematics, art, English, stories, topics and needlework. We have a computer. This week we are practising for the end of year assembly for our parents. It is all about moving and it has taken us a long time to work it out. We are doing it because our 4th years and Mrs. Birch, our Infant teacher, are leaving. In September, Mrs. Black from Swadlincote will come to take her place. But Mrs. Birch will not be far away as she lives in a bungalow just near to the school. We have a new headteacher this year. Mr. Williams became head of our school in January. All the Junior age childrem are in one room and in the infants are in another.
